payNow(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.fourchet.ui.orders.payments.PaymentController
This method is called when the user clicks on the "Pay now" button First, it checks if the user has selected a payment method Then, it checks if the user has filled all the fields and if the fields are valid If everything is ok, it calls the facade to save the payment
